http::to_status_class (1 of 2 overloads)

Convert an integer to a status_class.

Synopsis

Defined in header <boost/beast/http/status.hpp> 

status_class
to_status_class(
    unsigned v);
Description
Parameters

Name

Description

v

The integer representing a status code.

Return Value

The status class. If the integer does not match a known status class, status_class::unknown is returned.
